text: scala> import org.jsonds.JsonDSL._ import org.json4s.JsonDSL._ scala> val json = in_json.map{x=> | (“name® -» x.name) ~ (“age" -> x.age)} json: Array[org.jsonds.JsonAST.JObject] = Array(JObject(List((name,JString( jack)), (age,]Int(12)))), JObject(List((name,JString(lili)), (age,JInt(22)) )), JObject(List((name,JString(cc)), (age,JInt(11)))), JObject(List((name,] String(vv)), (age,JInt(13)))), JObject(List((name,JlString(lee)), (age,lInt( 14))))) scala> val jsons = json.map{x=>compact(render(x))} jsons: Array[String] = Array({"name":"jack","age":12}, {"name":"1ili","age" 122}, {"name":"cc","age":11}, {"name":"vv",k "age":13}, {"name":"lee","age":1 43) scala= sc.parallelize(jsons).repartition(l).saveAsTextFile("json out")
